sn22.28:1.2: “No cedam, bhikkhave, rupassa assado abhavissa nayidam satta rupasmim sarajjeyyum.
sn22.28:1.3: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi rupassa assado, tasma satta rupasmim sarajjanti.
sn22.28:1.4: No cedam, bhikkhave, rupassa adinavo abhavissa nayidam satta rupasmim nibbindeyyum.
sn22.28:1.5: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi rupassa adinavo, tasma satta rupasmim nibbindanti.
sn22.28:1.6: No cedam, bhikkhave, rupassa nissaranam abhavissa nayidam satta rupasma nissareyyum.
sn22.28:1.7: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi rupassa nissaranam, tasma satta rupasma nissaranti.
sn22.28:1.10: no cedam, bhikkhave, sankharanam nissaranam abhavissa, nayidam satta sankharehi nissareyyum.
sn22.28:1.11: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi sankharanam nissaranam, tasma satta sankharehi nissaranti.
sn22.28:1.12: No cedam, bhikkhave, vinnanassa assado abhavissa, nayidam satta vinnanasmim sarajjeyyum.
sn22.28:1.13: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi vinnanassa assado, tasma satta vinnanasmim sarajjanti.
sn22.28:1.14: No cedam, bhikkhave, vinnanassa adinavo abhavissa, nayidam satta vinnanasmim nibbindeyyum.
sn22.28:1.15: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi vinnanassa adinavo, tasma satta vinnanasmim nibbindanti.
sn22.28:1.16: No cedam, bhikkhave, vinnanassa nissaranam abhavissa, nayidam satta vinnanasma nissareyyum.
sn22.28:1.17: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, atthi vinnanassa nissaranam, tasma satta vinnanasma nissaranti.
sn22.28:2.1: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, satta imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam nabbhannamsu;
sn22.28:2.2: neva tava, bhikkhave, satta sadevaka loka samaraka sabrahmaka sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya nissata visamyutta vippamutta vimariyadikatena cetasa viharimsu.
sn22.28:2.3: Yato ca kho, bhikkhave, satta imesam pancannam upadanakkhandhanam assadanca assadato adinavanca adinavato nissarananca nissaranato yathabhutam abbhannamsu;
sn22.28:2.4: atha, bhikkhave, satta sadevaka loka samaraka sabrahmaka sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya nissata visamyutta vippamutta vimariyadikatena cetasa viharanti”.
